long.ru:
Capture and share screenshots!

Key features:
Capture:
- Desktop
- Page area with our pixel perfect 8x magnifier
- Visible page area
- Whole page
- Make timed screenshots
- Customize hotkeys

Annotate & edit:
- Highlight important details with arrows, pen, shapes and text
- Hide too personal and private information with blur tool
- Resize and crop screenshots

Save and share:
- Login to get free cloud storage space
- Upload screenshots to your Amazon S3 storage
